MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW3, SY13 & TF9 postcode areas of Crewe, Whitchurch & Market Drayton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 3:38PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to locate the source of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:41PM on 14th January 2021.
